Html:
Hi

when I open the first example that came from vincent ("DataGridSample.sln") in my vs and open the file "DataGridBasicSample.xaml", visual studio exits directly.

When I again open it, I have to call "clean solution", otherwise it exists again.

Any clue about this behaviour?

regards
Klaus

Do you have PowerCommands for VS2008 installed?  If so, it is because of that and is a known issue with their tool.  Unfortunately, you'll have to remove it. 

However, I'm guessing that that is not the issue since you are all good after cleaning.

Vincent

You are right, I have the Powertools installed

But the project I mentioned is the only one which I have problems with, even other demos from you are running normally,

Like DataGrid_ComboBoxColumnSamples.sln or VSM_and_DataGrid_Sample.sln

So there must be something particular with DataGridSample.sln

Regards
Klaus

Hi

after patching the config file like described here, powercommands work again

http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/vssetup/thread/e2434065-9921-4861-b914-9cc9d6c55553/

Regards
Klaus
